Kettle and idols
Hello, I'm Kettle, from the freezing room of Stardust.
I'm Ayaka Yasumoto, attendance number 5 from Shiritsu Ebisu Chugaku.
First of all, congratulations on the 15th anniversary of Shiritsu Ebisu Chugaku.
And to kick things off, on January 6th and 7th, we held the New Year's Grand Performance.
How do you feel about it looking back?
Well, this was the first time in a long time for Shiritsu Ebisu Chugaku to hold a New Year's Grand Performance.
We usually perform at the end of the year, but this was the first time in a while that we performed at the beginning of the year.
We wanted to bring something fun and uplifting to the people of Japan, so we performed for two days and had a lot of fun.
I think we had a lot of fun at the concert.
That's great!
And now, Ebichu...
It's been a little over a year since the current members came together.
Yes.
The two newly joined members, Emayuna and...
I've often taken energetic videos of them here at Kanto Idol.
What do you think of them from your point of view?
Well, yes...
They're... well... every time a new member joins the group...
I'm the type of person who gets a little shy and it takes me a while to get to know people.
But with Emma and Yuna, I feel like we have a similar vibe.
Especially Emma, I felt the same kind of vibe.
We've been going out to eat together, and we've become good friends.
Yes, yes, yes.
Mr. Sakurai...
He talks to me so smilingly.
I get caught up in it and before I know it, I'm smiling too.
That's right.

He corrects me.
